name: Baked Fish with Tomatoes, Zucchini, and Olive Sauce
author: THELMALU99
summary: This recipe is practically foolproof and easily adaptable to just about any fish and any vegetables you like or have around the house. Tasty! Serve over rice with a fresh green salad on the side.
ingredients: salt and ground black pepper to taste
¾ (6 ounce) can chopped black olives
directions: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Arrange tilapia in a baking dish
Add a splash of white wine and season with salt and pepper
Heat 1 tablespoon oil in a skillet over medium heat; stir in onion and garlic
Cook and stir until garlic is fragrant and onion is tender, about 3 minutes
Cover and simmer until tomatoes begin to release their juices, about 4 minutes
Add zucchini, olives, and wine; simmer for 5 minutes
Season with salt and simmer for 3 to 4 minutes longer
Spoon sauce over and around tilapia and drizzle with remaining olive oil
Bake in the preheated oven until fish flakes easily with a fork, about 45 minutes
